Operation 'delete-/cms/v3/blogs/posts/{objectId}_archive' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_side_effects, missing_output_details. The current description is too minimal. It lacks information about permanence, irreversibility, the response status, permission requirements, and side effects. AI agents need to understand that this is a destructive operation with consequences.

data.current_description: Delete a blog post by ID.
data.description_suggestion: Permanently deletes a blog post by its object ID. This operation removes the post from the system and cannot be undone. Returns a 204 No Content response on successful deletion. Requires appropriate permissions to delete the post.
data.reasoning: The current description is too minimal. It lacks information about permanence, irreversibility, the response status, permission requirements, and side effects. AI agents need to understand that this is a destructive operation with consequences.

message: Operation 'get-/cms/v3/blogs/posts/{objectId}/revisions_getPreviousVersions' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details, missing_context. The current description lacks specificity about what is returned, pagination support, and the use case. AI agents need to understand the response structure (VersionBlogPost objects), pagination capabilities, and when this operation would be useful for their workflows.

data.current_summary: Retrieves all previous versions of a post
data.current_description: Retrieve all the previous versions of a blog post.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all previous versions of a blog post by its object ID. Returns a collection of VersionBlogPost objects containing version history, timestamps, and change information. Supports pagination through query parameters. Useful for tracking post revisions and reverting to earlier versions if needed.
data.reasoning: The current description lacks specificity about what is returned, pagination support, and the use case. AI agents need to understand the response structure (VersionBlogPost objects), pagination capabilities, and when this operation would be useful for their workflows.

message: Operation 'post-/cms/v3/blogs/posts/multi-language/detach-from-lang-group_detachFromLangGroup' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Description is too minimal. Added clarity about required inputs (post ID), the side effect of independence from the group, and what is returned. This helps AI agents understand the operation's impact on the blog post's multi-language status.

data.current_summary: Detach post from a multi-language group
data.current_description: Detach a blog post from a [multi-language group](https://developers.hubspot.com/docs/guides/cms/content/multi-language-content).
data.description_suggestion: Detach a blog post from its multi-language group. Requires the blog post ID in the request body. After detachment, the post becomes independent and is no longer synchronized with other language variants in the group. Returns the updated blog post object.
data.reasoning: Description is too minimal. Added clarity about required inputs (post ID), the side effect of independence from the group, and what is returned. This helps AI agents understand the operation's impact on the blog post's multi-language status.

message: Operation 'post-/cms/v3/blogs/posts/batch/archive_archive' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, unclear_purpose, inconsistent_terminology. Original summary says 'Delete' but operation is tagged as 'archive' and the description mentions archive function, creating confusion. Changed summary to 'Archive' for consistency with operation name and tag. Enhanced description to clarify the permanent deletion nature, distinguish from dashboard archive, explain inputs (batch of IDs), and specify the batch response format for AI agent clarity.

data.current_summary: Delete a batch of blog posts
data.current_description:
Delete a blog post by ID. 
Note: This is not the same as the in-app `archive` function. To perform a dashboard `archive` send an normal update with the `archivedInDashboard` field set to `true`.
data.summary_suggestion: Archive a batch of blog posts
data.description_suggestion: Permanently delete a batch of blog posts by their IDs. This operation removes posts from the system entirely and is distinct from the dashboard archive function. To archive posts in the dashboard instead, use a batch update with the `archivedInDashboard` field set to `true`. Accepts a batch of post IDs in the request body. Returns a batch response indicating success or failure for each post.
data.reasoning: Original summary says 'Delete' but operation is tagged as 'archive' and the description mentions archive function, creating confusion. Changed summary to 'Archive' for consistency with operation name and tag. Enhanced description to clarify the permanent deletion nature, distinguish from dashboard archive, explain inputs (batch of IDs), and specify the batch response format for AI agent clarity.

data.current_summary: Attach post to a multi-language group
data.current_description: Attach a blog post to a [multi-language group](https://developers.hubspot.com/docs/guides/cms/content/multi-language-content).
data.description_suggestion: Attach a blog post to a multi-language group. Requires the blog post ID and target multi-language group ID in the request body. After attachment, the post becomes part of the group and will be synchronized with other language variants. Returns the updated blog post object with its new multi-language group association.
data.reasoning: Description lacks essential details about inputs (post ID and group ID), the side effect of synchronization with other variants, and the return value. Enhanced description provides clarity on what data is required and how the operation affects the post's state for better AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'put-/cms/v3/blogs/posts/multi-language/set-new-lang-primary_setLangPrimary' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Summary is too generic ('Set a new primary language' could apply to many contexts). Enhanced to clarify it's for multi-language groups. Description mentions post ID but lacks clarity on what 'primary language' means operationally and what is returned. Added context about synchronization impact and return value for AI agent clarity.

data.current_description: Set the primary language of a [multi-language group](https://developers.hubspot.com/docs/guides/cms/content/multi-language-content) to the language of the provided post (specified as an ID in the request body)
data.summary_suggestion: Set primary language for multi-language group
data.description_suggestion: Set the primary language of a multi-language group to the language of a specified blog post. Requires the blog post ID in the request body. The post's language becomes the group's primary language, affecting content synchronization and default language selection. Returns the updated multi-language group configuration.
data.reasoning: Summary is too generic ('Set a new primary language' could apply to many contexts). Enhanced to clarify it's for multi-language groups. Description mentions post ID but lacks clarity on what 'primary language' means operationally and what is returned. Added context about synchronization impact and return value for AI agent clarity.

data.reasoning: Summary is clear and action-oriented. Description is minimal but functional. data.current_summary: Schedule a post to be published
data.current_description: Schedule a blog post to be published at a specified time.
data.description_suggestion: Schedule a blog post for publication at a specified time. Accepts a ContentScheduleRequestVNext object containing the post ID and desired publish timestamp. Returns the updated blog post object with the scheduled publish time. The post will automatically transition to published status at the specified time.
data.reasoning: Description lacks critical details about what inputs are required (post ID, timestamp), what is returned (updated post object), and important side effects (automatic publication at scheduled time). These details are essential for AI agents to understand the operation's full scope and effects.

Original description has a grammatical error ('by ID. identified') and lacks clarity about response format, error handling, and batch limitations. AI agents need to understand that 207 responses indicate partial success and that there are batch size constraints.

data.current_summary: Retrieve a batch of Blog Posts
data.current_description: Retrieve a batch of blog posts by ID. identified in the request body.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieve multiple blog posts by their IDs specified in the request body. Accepts a BatchInputString containing an array of post IDs. Returns a batch response with retrieved posts and any errors encountered (HTTP 207 indicates partial success with some failures). Supports retrieving up to the batch size limit in a single request.
data.reasoning: Original description has a grammatical error ('by ID. identified') and lacks clarity about response format, error handling, and batch limitations. AI agents need to understand that 207 responses indicate partial success and that there are batch size constraints.

data.current_description: Explicitly set new languages for each post in a [multi-language group](https://developers.hubspot.com/docs/guides/cms/content/multi-language-content).
data.description_suggestion: Explicitly set new languages for each post in a multi-language group. Accepts an UpdateLanguagesRequestVNext object specifying the group ID and new language assignments. Returns the updated multi-language group configuration. This operation replaces the existing language set - all posts in the group will be reassigned to the specified languages, potentially creating or removing language variants.
data.reasoning: Description lacks input details (what parameters are needed), output details (what is returned), and critical side effects (that this replaces existing languages and may create/remove variants). AI agents need this information to understand the operation's impact on existing content.

data.current_summary: Update a batch of Blog Posts
data.current_description: Update a batch of blog posts.
data.description_suggestion: Update multiple blog posts in a single request. Accepts a BatchInputJsonNode containing an array of blog post objects with IDs and fields to update. Returns a batch response with updated posts and any errors encountered (HTTP 207 indicates partial success). Supports partial updates - only specified fields will be modified for each post.
data.reasoning: Original description is too minimal and lacks essential details. AI agents need to understand the input format (JSON nodes with IDs), that partial updates are supported, and that 207 responses indicate partial success with some failures.

data.current_summary: Retrieve the full draft version of the Blog Post
data.current_description: Retrieve the full draft version of a blog post.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieve the complete draft version of a blog post by its ID. Requires the post ID as a path parameter. Returns the full VersionBlogPost object containing all draft content, metadata, and unpublished changes. Returns 404 if the post or draft does not exist.
